biotools.summary: Software for Computational de Novo Design of Organic and Inorganic Molecules | DENOPTIM is a software package for de novo design and virtual screening of functional molecules of any kind | DENOPTIM (De Novo OPTimization of In/organic Molecules) is a software meant for de novo design and virtual screening of functional compounds. In practice, DENOPTIM is meant for building chemical entities by assembling building blocks (i.e., fragments), processing each chemical entity as to produce its figure of merit (i.e., fitness), and designing new entities based on the properties of entities generated before.

In practice, DENOPTIM is meant for building chemical entities by assembling building blocks (i.e., fragments), processing each chemical entity as to produce its figure of merit (i.e., fitness), and designing new entities based on the properties of entities generated before.
